t: HIGH BAR BRANDS ACQUIRES BETTSHD FROM BETTS COMPANY - Betts1868
s: January 13, 2025 - OWATONNA, MN — 9/5/2024 — High Bar Brands (“HBB”), a leading provider of commercial vehicle solutions, has announced the acquisition of BettsHD, a division of the 156-year-old Betts Company, based in Fresno, California.
